name: Dog Dodge
description:
Dog Dodge was a platformer game made in 6 weeks. Initially the game was going to be a 2.5D side scrolling game but as the project progressed we realised it had more potential as a 3d third person platformer. The initial idea come from mixing games like Super Mario 64 with the concept of frogger. Having the dog dodge in and out of traffic try to get to the other side. 

CREDITS: Clifford Erskine, Kye Elliott-Moyle, Mohamed Sciberras, Mitchell Honer, Allegra Marasco-Allen
